1211880.name: ΔV: Rings of Saturn - Tales from the Rings
1211880.description:
"Tales from the Rings" contains supplemental material set in the universe of "ΔV: Rings of Saturn". This free DLC currently contains:

e-books

  • "Howling at the Stars" by Eric Eshleman (pdf)
  • "Tales from the Rings" by Eric Eshleman (pdf)
  • "K37 TNTRL Operation and Service Manual" - an Digital Artbook (pdf)

graphics

  • 6 original 4K-resolution wallpapers.
  • 256 character avatars you can use anywhere you want.

other assets

  • cellphone wallpapers.
  • ringtones.
  • templates for custom in-game ship paint.
  • 3d models of the ships.
  • crew portraits.
  • seamless animations for streaming and desktop background.

You can find all the files of this DLC in your game directory, under tales-from-the-rings subdirectory.
